name: Alabama Hotel Hobart
description:
The Alabama was first established as a hotel in 1867. The building has undergone a few changes since then but was re-established as a boutique style art hotel in 2013.The hotel is owned and operated by Tassie locals with emphasis on creating an enjoyable,affordable and artistic space suitable for world travellers and inter state visitors alike.

The Alabama offers beautiful budget accommodation  as well as a public bar/cafe and balcony terrace  right in the heart of Hobart. 

You'll find it to be far more interesting than your standard hotel or motel because it is unique,sincere,a little quirky and a whole lot special.

We are very close to a variety of restaurants, shops, galleries and a lovely farmers market. The famous Salamanca market and the MONA ferry are less than 10 minutes' walk away.

All rooms are heated and have access to communal/shared bathroom facilities. 

Guest luggage storage is available.

Accessed via stairs only, the reception is on the 1st floor and rooms are located on both the 1st and 2nd floors.

The closest airport to Alabama Hotel is Hobart Airport, 15 km from the property.

houseRules.notes:
Thanks for your interest in The Alabama!

We have compiled a big old list of super important Bam facts below, please read before making your booking with us . Unfortunately we do not accept any responsibility if guests arriving are not aware of the following:

Terms and conditions of your stay:

-Free cancellation up to 7 days before check in.

-No shows are subject to being charged up to the amount of your first night's stay.

- You must be over the age of 18 to stay at The Alabama Hotel.

- We require a valid credit/debit card as well as Drivers licence or passport upon check-in. These ideally must match the name on the booking. If the booking has been made for someone else we must be contacted prior to be made aware. Booking Cancellations and Refunds:

*PLEASE NOTE: UNFORTUNATELY WE CAN NO LONGER ACCEPT ANY COVID-19 RELATED CANCELLATION POLICY EXEMPTIONS. BOOKINGS ARE MADE AT GUESTS OWN RISK IN KNOWING THAT WE ARE STILL IN THE MIDST OF A PANDEMIC*



To ensure that you are fully aware of the ins and outs of our hotel we have compiled some important information below. 

The last thing we want is for our guests to be unhappy with their choice so please read it over carefully. 

If you have made this booking on behalf of someone else please ensure that they are provided with the details.

- An ETA would be very much appreciated as we are not open 24 hrs

- Check in at the hotel is after 2 pm but we do have luggage storage you can use while you wait (Please contact us prior to arrange for this)

- Our Reception/bar opening hours are between 10 am and 8 pm most days (these can vary with seasons and level of occupancy)

If you think youll be arriving outside of these hours be sure to let us know PRIOR to your check- in day!

- You have booked a room with a SHARED bathroom. This means the bathrooms are down the hall and shared with other guests. It is important to note there no rooms with a private bathroom. If this is not your style we understand, but please be aware of this before staying and / or reviewing. 

- Our hotel has 17 rooms, all are as cute as one another but not all are featured on this website. Please do not expect specific decor as they are changed up regularly.

- Our inner city location means we have NO ON-SITE PARKING. Nearby parking information can be found on our website here: https://www.alabamahobart.com.au/getting-here-parking

- Our building is almost 200 years old, there is no elevator. Guests must be able to carry their own luggage up two flights of stairs. 

- We have good quality free wifi with a large individual data limit per device, there are no televisions. 

- Rooms do not feature water or mountain views. 

- Tea and coffee are available to purchase from the guest lounge ,we do not have those items or kettles in the rooms. There are no guest cooking facilities at the hotel. Breakfast is not included.

- Our rooms are unserviced - meaning we do not go into your room and clean it during your short stay. If you are staying a week, we will clean the room after 4 nights. 

- The Alabama is a 100% non smoking hotel. Smoking in your room is strictly prohibited and guests doing so will be fined $250, asked to leave immediately and not be welcomed again. 

Please read all of these items carefully before your stay, to avoid disappointment. 

We are looking forward to hosting your time in Hobart and are here to help if you have any questions or concerns.

Big Love and hope to see you soon!

The Bam Fam x
